original_title: My Life as a Teenage Robot: Escape from Cluster Prime
overview: A Nickelodeon television special. Jenny/XJ9 accidentally ruins everybody's day by causing massive collateral damage to the town. Shunned by everyone but her closest friends, she wanders the wreckage and stumbles onto a transporter Vexus used to escape. She is transported to Cluster Prime - a supposed robot utopia.
title: My Life as a Teenage Robot: Escape from Cluster Prime
